about_the_game:
Ever wondered how stealth games of the future will look like?
This is how. Safe Not Safe reinvigorates the genre in several fundamental ways.

Outsmart the revolutionary A.I.


Modern games are still using decades-old technologies when it comes to Artificial Intelligence. It is time to fix this.

A.I. solution for Safe Not Safe was developed from scratch using the latest advances in Personalization and Machine Learning. A single smart A.I. agent controls the robotic security on a high level. The security learns from your actions, reacts to events, and develops smarter and stronger defenses on the fly.

Unravel the mystery


The Story is presented as a huge investigation board. Each node is a mission that, when completed, grows the narrative network in unique, non-linear ways depending on the mission outcome and your playstyle. The story grows based on how you play.

Choose your tools

Change the way you play the game by finding and stealing upgrades during the missions. Mix and match upgrades supporting three distinct playstyles:

  • Commando - Be direct and loud. Master the arsenal of firearms and heavy weapons.
  • Ninja - Bring silent violence or avoid the contact altogether. Traverse the levels by jumping between roofs and climbing walls.
  • Hacker - Exploit your environment by hacking anything. Disable, jam, distract the security or even turn your enemies against each other.

Find your way


Too often missions in stealth games are designed like a puzzle. All you need to do is to find the “correct” pre-designed way to solve it.

In Safe Not Safe each mission is a personal challenge. The levels are generated just for you. The security A.I. is analyzing every infiltration you made and builds up defenses and challenges in unique and surprising ways.

Your skills and preparation are all that matter. Explore freely and find your own path to the goal without pre-designed solutions.



If challenging stealth gameplay is your thing - give our (very early alpha) demo a try.

Bring your best game!

Sign up to our newsletter for exclusive access to the next alpha builds.

name: Safe Not Safe Demo
short_description: Immersive action-stealth game with roguelike elements. Outsmart the revolutionary A.I. that learns from your actions and creates personalized challenges. Infiltrate ever-changing sandbox levels. Find your own way to the safe and get out alive.
